channel.title: Comments on: G3E3 End
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Thanks, Alik. I'm sure we'll get a chance to talk/meet
As for a new relationship... I'm OK the way it is for now.
Hope you're doing well at work.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks, Alik. I’m sure we’ll get a chance to talk/meet

As for a new relationship… I’m OK the way it is for now.

Hope you’re doing well at work.

item.title: By: Alik
item.dc:creator: Alik
item.description:
It's been hectic recently. I wanted to call and ask how is it going but haven't had the time. Now I know.
If you don't find the right words in your blog than it is a sad breakup.
Why? How? Orly has some single friends :)
item.content:encoded:
It’s been hectic recently.
I wanted to call and ask how is it going but haven’t had the time.
Now I know.

If you don’t find the right words in your blog than it is a sad breakup.

Why? How? Orly has some single friends :)
